posts.post_content:
I've received several emails/messages about the t210 Series 5 and 7 groups wanting to know if I was going to break up these lots.  My initial plan is to pursue both sets so the bulk of these will stay with me.  However, I figure I'd list them out for everybody just in case I'm able to swing a few trades for cards I need to complete sets I'm close on.  If there's a card that someone really needs, feel free to write and we can always talk about it too.  

Conditionwise, most of these cards are very very nice.  No dogs and all are still displayable.  In many cases, the cards are even free from wrinkling altogether.  What holds a lot of the cards back are small bits of paper loss on the back due to being attached to a scrapbook.  

Thanks much,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]


 -- WANTLIST --

t210 Orange Borders - need any.  Pink and yellow borders too :)
EUNC orange borders - any commons
d311s (need 15) Burrell, Castleton, Christian, Daley, Delhi, Dillon, Gregory, Kuhn, Lewis, Maggert, Ryan, Stamfield, Steen, Tennant, Wares
1918 Zeenuts - need any
1919 Zeenuts (need 11) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Spencer (saltlake), Seaton (SF), Smith, Bill (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Check (Vern), Meusel (vern)
w590 - REALLY, REALLY need a Spencer!!!


Here's the large list of t210-5s I received.  One note....no t210-7s in here.  Just the Series 5s for now.


Series 5
Abercrombie FR/GD - wrinkle across middle, some back damage 
Averett GD - no wrinkling, some back damage
Bigbie FR/GD - wrinkle in corner, some back damage
Brannon GD/VG - corner chipping, no wrinkling/creasing, damage free on back
Brazell GD - wrinkle across middle, tiny nick on back
Bullock GD - no wrinkling, some back damage
Corbett VG - very nice, no wrinkling on front.  No back damage
Coutts FR/GD - nice VG/EX on front, small areas of damage on back
Crouch VG - mild corner chipping, no wrinkling, no damage on back
Derrick GD/VG - vg/ex w/ no wrinkling on front, bits of residue and a nick on back
Ehrhardt FR - VG on front, no wrinkling, some back damage
Fairbanks GD - no wrinkling on front, two small areas of wear on back
Ferrell FR/GD - corner edge/wear on front, no wrinkling, small area of damage on back
Finn GD - VG+ on front, no wrinkling, tiny spot of damage on back
Francisco GD/VG - wrinkle free and nice on front, mild residue on back
Gardin FR/GD - very nice front, no wrinkles, a couple tiny areas of damage on back
Gilmore GD - great catcing pose, mild corner wear on front, mostly clean back
Gorman FR/GD - wrinkle across middle, some back damage
Guss GD - no wrinkling, some back damage
Harrington FR - a couple tiny wrinkles, some back damage
Harris VG - no wrinkling, very mild residue on back
Hartley GD - no wrinkling, tiny spot of damage on back
Hayes VG - no wrinkling, back mostly clean and damage free
Humphrey FR - corner chipping, one wrinkle, mostly clean and damage free on back
Jackson GD - nice wrinkle free front, tiny spot of damage on back
Jenkins FR - corner/edge chipping, no wrinkling, tiny dots of wear on back
Laval FR/GD - very nice on front, no wrinkling...tiny areas of damage on back
Lothrop GD - wrinkle free front, tiny spot of damage on back
Mangum GD - wrinkle free front, tiny spot of damage on back
J. McCarthy GD - no wrinkling, very nice front, two tiny spots of damage on reverse
McFarlin GD - terrific pose, no wrinkling and great looking front.  Mild residue and wear on reverse
Midkiff PR/FR - still a displayable card but has a couple wrinkles on front with some mild wear on reverse
Moore FR/GD - faint corner wrinkle, residue and tiny areas of wear on back 
Redfern FR/GD - mild corner wear, residue and tiny areas of wear on back 
Reis FR - missing left border, couple spider wrinkles on front, tiny areas of wear on reverse
Smith GD - VG/EX on front, no wrinkling and mostly sharp corners, couple areas of wear on reverse
Templin PR/FR - wrinkling, corner wear, couple scrapes on back
Thrasher FR - corner wear, no wrinkling, a couple scrapes on back
Thrasher VG - EX condition on front, sharp corners, no wrinkles....mild residue on reverse
Walters FR - wrinkling on front, back mostly clean and damage free
Wehrell VG - a bit of edge chipping, no wrinkling, back mostly clean and damage free
Williams FR/GD - mild corner chipping, no wrinkling, some reside/scuffing on back
Wynne FR/GD - no wrinkling, some reside/scuffing on back
